pageProduct.name: Revvies Energy Strips Extra Strength Cola Lemon Spark 5 Pack
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Revvies Extra Strength 100mg Cola Lemon Spark strips offer the same great tasting, fast, easy on the stomach, and sugar-free caffeine boost, but for those that need a bigger hit. They are a great pre-workout as there is not liquid to slosh around. Just place a strip on your tongue and in 20-30 seconds its gone and you're good to go. No stopping. No queuing. No sticky mess. Revvies are used by Olympic athletes like 9 x national Aussie running champion Eloise Wellings, and many pro teams teams in the NRL, AFL, Super 15 Rugby and Super Netball. So whether you're an active bod looking for a safe and quality caffeine source, or a professional with back to back meetings, a student cramming for exams, or just need to get through a hectic day, Revvies can help keep you moving. Revvies are also accredited through informed-sport quality assurance program meaning every batch is tested for WADA banned substance before going on sale. Revvies can be taken without water, are suitable for vegetarians, are gluten free and contain less than a calorie a strip. Each Revvies Extra Strength strip contains 100 mg caffeine or about the same as a strong espresso.

Warnings

This product contains caffeine. It is not recommended for children (those under 18), pregnant or lactating women, or those sensitive to caffeine. Exceeding 4 serves a day, may cause harm.

Country of Origin
Made in the United Kingdom. Imagined in Australia and New Zealand.

Common Uses

Revvies Extra Strength are great before a run, ride or as a pre-workout. They are also great on game day. Designed for larger athletes or those with a higher caffeine tolerance.

Directions

Take 1-2 strips when you need a boost or about five minutes before exercise. Peel open the packet at the arrows in the right hand corner.
If you are going to take them on a run or during a ride we recommend that you pre peel the strips and fold over.
Take out the strip.
Pop it flat on your tongue and let it dissolve.
You're good to go! If you feel you need more, then you can take additional strips.
